Element.Name: Customization identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the specification of content and rules that apply to the transaction.

Element.Name: Profile identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the BII profile or business process context in which the transaction appears.

Element.Name: Order identifier
Element.Description: A transaction instance must have an identifier. The identifier enables referencing the transaction for various purposes such as from other transactions that are part of the same process.

Element.Name: Sales order reference
Element.Description: An identifier of a referenced sales order, issued by the Seller.

Element.Name: Order issue date
Element.Description: The date on which the transaction instance was issued.

Element.Name: Order issue time
Element.Description: The time assigned by the buyer on which the order was issued.

Element.Name: Consignment order indication
Element.Description: "Indicates wether the order is a purchase order or consignement order. Default is purchase order.

Element.Name: Document level textual note
Element.Description: Free form text applying to the Order. This element may contain notes or any other similar information that is not contained explicitly in another structure.
Element.Value: Packages of other sizes are OK

Element.Name: Currency
Element.Description: The default currency for the order.

Element.Name: Buyers accounting string
Element.Description: Used by the buyer to specify a reference that should be repeated in e.g. invoice to enable the buyer to automatically book e.g. to the right project, or account.

Element.Name: Order validity end date
Element.Description: The end date for when the order is valid. The end date for the time period within which the seller must respond.
Reference to quotation which is basis for the order

Element.Name: Quotation document reference
Element.Description: A requirement to give a unique reference to the quotation that is the base for the order.
Order reference

Element.Name: Order document reference
Element.Description: Used to reference the initial order that was rejected and a new order is issued.
Reference to originator document

Element.Name: Originator document reference
Element.Description: A reference to Originator Document. To be able to give a reference to the internal requesition on the buyer site on which the order is based.
Reference to additional documents

Element.Name: Document identifier
Element.Description: An identifier for the referenced document.

Element.Name: Document description
Element.Description: A short description of the document type.
Specification of attachment(s)

Element.Name: Attached binary object
Element.Description: The attached document embeded as binary object.

Attribute.Name: Attached document Mime code
Attribute.Description: The mime code of the attached document.

Attribute.Name: Attached document Filename
Attribute.Description: The file name of the attached document

Element.Description: Reference to external document

Element.Name: External document URI
Element.Description: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that identifies where the external document is located.
Reference to contract

Element.Name: Reference identifier
Element.Description: Positive identification of the reference such as a unique identifier.
Buyer information
Description of buyer

Element.Name: Buyer party endpoint identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the end point of the routing service.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Scheme identifier for electronic address

Element.Description: Buyer identification

Element.Name: Buyer party identification
Element.Description: An identification for the buyer party.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Scheme identifier for party identification

Element.Name: Buyer name
Element.Description: Name of buyer The name of the party who orders the listed items.
Buyer address

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Address line 3
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country.The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.
Buyer tax information

Element.Name: Buyer VAT identifier
Element.Description: The buyers registered Value Added Tax identifier. To be stated in case reverse charge is to apply to the purchase.
Mandatory element. Use = "VAT"
Buyer legal information

Element.Name: Buyers legal registration name
Element.Description: The official name of the party as registered with the relevant fiscal authority.

Element.Name: Buyers legal registration identifier
Element.Description: Identifies a company as registered with the company registration scheme.

Attribute.Name: Buyer legal registration identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the buyer legal registration identifier.

Element.Description: Legal address

Element.Name: Buyers legal registration address city name
Element.Description: Associates with the registered address of the party within a Corporate Registration Scheme. The name of a city, town, or village.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country.The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.
Buyer contact information

Element.Name: Contact person name
Element.Description: The name of the contact person.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: A phone number for the contact person. If the person has a direct number, this is that number.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: The e-mail address for the contact person. If the person has a direct e-mail this is that email.
Seller information
Description of seller

Element.Name: Seller party endpoint identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the end point of the routing service.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Scheme identifier for electronic address

Element.Description: Seller identification

Element.Name: Seller party identification
Element.Description: Identifies a party.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Scheme identifier for party identification

Element.Name: Seller party name
Element.Description: Name of seller The name of the party.

Element.Name: Seller party name
Element.Description: The name of the party.
Seller address

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Address line 3
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country.The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.
Seller contact information

Element.Name: Contact person name
Element.Description: The name of the contact person.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: A phone number for the contact person. If the person has a direct number, this is that number.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: The e-mail address for the contact person. If the person has a direct e-mail this is that email.
Information regarding the originator of the order
Description of the originator party
Identification of the originator

Element.Name: Originator identifier
Element.Description: Identifies a party.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Scheme identifier for party identification

Element.Description: Name of the originator

Element.Name: Originator name
Element.Description: The name of the party.
The originators contact information

Element.Name: Contact person name
Element.Description: The name of the contact person.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: A phone number for the contact person. If the person has a direct number, this is that number.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: The e-mail address for the contact person. If the person has a direct e-mail this is that email.
Information regarding the receiver of the invoice based on the order (Invoicee)
Party information

Element.Name: Endpoint identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the end point of the routing service.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Scheme identifier for electronic address

Element.Description: Identification of the party

Element.Name: Party identification
Element.Description: An identification for the invoicee party.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Scheme identifier for party identification

Element.Description: Name of the party

Element.Name: Party name
Element.Description: The name of the party who should be invoiced for the ordered items.

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.
Element.Value: The main address line in the postal address, usually the street name and number

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Address line 3
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country.The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.
Tax information of the party

Element.Name: Invoicee VAT identifier
Element.Description: The invoicees registered Value Added Tax identifier
Mandatory element. Use = "VAT"
Legal information of the party

Element.Name: Legal registration name
Element.Description: The official name of the party as registered with the relevant fiscal authority.

Element.Name: Company ID
Element.Description: Identifies a company as registered with the company registration scheme.

Attribute.Name: Buyer legal registration identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the buyer legal registration identifier.

Element.Description: Legal address

Element.Name: City name
Element.Description: Associates with the registered address of the party within a Corporate Registration Scheme. The name of a city, town, or village.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country.The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Contact identifier
Element.Description: Reference to invoicee contact
Delivery information
Delivery location
Delivery address

Element.Name: Delivery location ID
Element.Description: An identifer for the location to where the ordered items should be delivered.

Attribute.Name: Deliver to location identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the Deliver to location identifier.

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Address line 3
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country.The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.
Requested delivery period

Element.Name: Period start date
Element.Description: The date on which the period starts. The start dates counts as part of the period.

Element.Name: Period end date
Element.Description: The date on which the period ends. The end date counts as part of the period.
Delivery party
Identification of delivery party

Element.Name: Delivery party ID
Element.Description: An identifier for the party that should deliver the ordered items.In this BIS: The identifier of the party that should receive the ordered items

Attribute.Name: Deliver party registration identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the deliverparty identifier.

Element.Description: Name of delivery party

Element.Name: Delivery party name
Element.Description: The name of the party that should handle the delivery.In this BIS: The name of the party that should receive the delivery
Contact information for the delivery party

Element.Name: Contact person name
Element.Description: The name of the contact person.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: A phone number for the contact person. If the person has a direct number, this is that number.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: The e-mail address for the contact person. If the person has a direct e-mail this is that email.
Terms of delivery

Element.Name: Delivery terms
Element.Description: The ability for the buyer to specify what shipping terms should apply the delivery of the order.

Element.Name: Delivery special terms
Element.Description: A description of special conditions relating to the Delivery Terms.

Element.Name: Delivery terms location
Element.Description: The location to which the delivery terms refer. Used to qualify the delivery terms e.g. "Terms of delivery are FOB Rotterdam"

Element.Name: Payment terms
Element.Description: Payment terms for the order described in text
Allowances and charges for the order

Element.Name: AllowanceChargeIndicator
Element.Description: true = Charge, false = Allowance

Element.Name: Allowance and charges reason
Element.Description: A textual reason for the allowance or the charge. Can also be its name.

Element.Name: Allowance and charge amount
Element.Description: The net amount of the allowance or the charge exluding VAT.

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, value must be the same as what is used in tir01-007, DocumentCurrencyCode.

Element.Name: Document level allowance or charge VAT category code
Element.Description: A coded identification of what VAT category applies to the document level allowance or charge.

Element.Name: Document level allowance or charge VAT rate
Element.Description: The VAT rate, represented as percentage that applies to the document level allowance or charge.
Tax scheme. Use âVATâ
Specification of tax amount

Element.Name: VAT total amount
Element.Description: The total VAT amount that is "added to the document total w/o VAT". This is the sum of all VAT subcategory amounts. The expected Tax Total in the corresponding invoice.

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, value must be the same as what is used in tir01-007, DocumentCurrencyCode.

Element.Description: Estimated total amounts for the order

Element.Name: Sum of line amounts
Element.Description: Sum of line amounts in the document.The total of Line Extension Amounts net of tax and settlement discounts, but inclusive of any applicable rounding amount.

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, value must be the same as what is used in tir01-007, DocumentCurrencyCode.

Element.Name: Document total without VAT
Element.Description: The "Sum of line amounts" plus "sum of allowances on document level" plus "sum of charges on document level".

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, value must be the same as what is used in tir01-007, DocumentCurrencyCode.

Element.Name: Document total including VAT
Element.Description: The total value including VAT

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, value must be the same as what is used in tir01-007, DocumentCurrencyCode.

Element.Name: Sum of allowances on document level
Element.Description: Sum of all allowances on header level in the document. Allowances on line level are included in the line amount and summed up into the "sum of line amounts"

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, value must be the same as what is used in tir01-007, DocumentCurrencyCode.

Element.Name: Sum of charges on document level
Element.Description: Sum of all charge on header level in the document. Charges on line level are included in the line amount and summed up into the "sum of line amounts"

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, value must be the same as what is used in tir01-007, DocumentCurrencyCode.

Element.Name: Paid amounts
Element.Description: Any amounts that have been paid a-priory.

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, value must be the same as what is used in tir01-007, DocumentCurrencyCode.

Element.Name: Rounding of document total
Element.Description: Any rounding of the "Document total including VAT"

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, value must be the same as what is used in tir01-007, DocumentCurrencyCode.

Element.Name: Amount for payment
Element.Description: The amount that is expected to be paid based on the document. This amount is the "Document total including VAT" less the "paid amounts" that have been paid a-priori.The total amount to be paid. Estimated total amount of order including VAT

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, value must be the same as what is used in tir01-007, DocumentCurrencyCode.

Element.Description: Specification of order lines

Element.Name: Order line note
Element.Description: Free-form text applying to the Order Line. This element may contain notes or any other similar information that is not contained explicitly in another structure. Is to capture any free form description related to the order line as a whole.
Description of line item

Element.Name: Document line identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the Line Item assigned by the buyer.

Element.Name: Ordered quantity
Element.Description: The quantity of Items for the Line Item. The quantity for the order line.

Attribute.Name: Ordered quantity unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to the ordered quantity.

Element.Name: Order line amount
Element.Description: The total amount for the Line Item, including Allowance Charges but net of taxes. The expected line amount excluding VAT but inclusive of other charges, allowances and taxes.

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, value must be the same as what is used in tir01-007, DocumentCurrencyCode.

Element.Name: Partial Delivery Allowed Indicator
Element.Description: Indicates if the line items must be delivered in a single shipment. Default that partial delivery is allowed.

Element.Name: Buyers accounting string
Element.Description: The buyer's accounting information applied to the Line Item, expressed as text.
Delivery information for the order line
Requested delivery period for the order line

Element.Name: Period start date
Element.Description: The date on which the period starts. The start dates counts as part of the period.

Element.Name: Period end date
Element.Description: The date on which the period ends. The end date counts as part of the period.
Information regarding the originator of the order line
Identification of the originator

Element.Name: Order line originator party ID
Element.Description: The party who originated Order.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Scheme identifier for party identification

Element.Description: Name of the originator

Element.Name: Order line originator party name
Element.Description: The party who originated Order.
Price information

Element.Name: Iitem price
Element.Description: The net price of the item including all allowances, charges and taxes but exluding VAT. Although price is an optional element in an order it recommended as best practice to either state the price or provide reference to an appropriate source from which the price can be identified such as a contract, catalogue or a quote.

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, value must be the same as what is used in tir01-007, DocumentCurrencyCode.

Element.Name: Item price base quantity
Element.Description: The actual quantity to which the price applies.

Attribute.Name: Base quantity unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to the base quantity.

Element.Description: Allowance and charge information connected to price

Element.Name: AllowanceChargeIndicator
Element.Description: Only valid value is false (meaning an allowance)

Element.Name: Amount
Element.Description: The net amount for the allowance charge connected to the price

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, value must be the same as what is used in tir01-007, DocumentCurrencyCode.

Element.Name: Item list price
Element.Description: The gross price of the item before subtracting discounts. E.g. list price.

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, value must be the same as what is used in tir01-007, DocumentCurrencyCode.

Element.Description: Item information

Element.Name: Item description as text
Element.Description: Free-form field that can be used to give a text description of the item. A detailed description of the item. Use one description per language.Test text for capturing notes

Element.Name: Item name
Element.Description: A short name for an item.A short name optionally given to an item, such as a name from a Catalogue, as distinct from a description.

Element.Name: Buyers item identifier
Element.Description: The BuyerCustomerParty identifier for the item.

Element.Name: Sellers item identifier
Element.Description: An identifier, assigned by the seller, for the item. Associates the item with its identification according to the seller's system.

Element.Name: Item standard identifier
Element.Description: An item identifier based on a registered scheme. Associates the item with its identification according to a standard system.

Attribute.Name: Item standard identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the Item standard identifier

Element.Description: Document reference

Element.Name: Document reference
Element.Description: Reference to an external document (ID) when it is necessary to specify the details of the item.

Element.Name: Item classification code
Element.Description: A code for classifying the item by its type or nature. Classification codes are used to allow grouping of similar items for a various purposes e.g. public procurement (CPV), e-Commerce (UNSPSC) etc.

Attribute.Name: Item classification identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the Item classification identifier

Attribute.Name: Item classification identifier version identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme version identifier of the Item classification identifier

Element.Name: Item VAT category code
Element.Description: The VAT category code for the item.

Element.Name: Line VAT rate
Element.Description: The VAT percentage rate that applies to the line amount.
Tax scheme. Use âVATâ

Element.Name: Item property name
Element.Description: The name of the property.The name must be sufficiently descriptive to define the value. The definition may be supplemented with the property unit of measure when relevant.

Element.Name: Item property value
Element.Description: The value of the item property.

Element.Name: Item property unit of measure
Element.Description: The unit of measure in which the property value is stated, if relevant. May not be relevant when properties are descriptive.

Attribute.Name: Value quantity unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to the value quantity.

Element.Name: Qualification of qty
Element.Description: Description of the quantity

Element.Name: Item instance information
Element.Description: Information relevant to an item instance or shared by the items in the order line.

Element.Name: Item serial identification
Element.Description: An identifier that is specific to the items in the order line.

Element.Name: Item lot information
Element.Description: Information about the production lot which the order line items come from.

Element.Name: Item lot identifier
Element.Description: An identifier for the production lot which the order line items come from.
